locations.name: front_gate
locations.desc: You're outside the front gate of town. A town guard is iun front of it and a rock is on the floor nearby.

items.name: rock
items.desc: A small rock. No bigger than your palm.

characters.name: guard
characters.desc: He's standing in front of the town gate. Looks angry...

items.name: town_key
items.desc: A key to the town front gate!

locations.name: main_street
locations.desc: The main street of town, with the town center up ahead. To your left is the General Store, and the Tavern is on your right.

characters.name: old_man
characters.desc: An old man. He's carrying a cool walking stick.

items.name: walking_stick
items.desc: A well worn but smooth walking stick.

characters.name: young_boy
characters.desc: An young boy is running towards me. He's coming fast!

locations.name: tavern
locations.desc: A warm and bustling place. I wonder if I can find work here.

characters.name: bar_tender
characters.desc: The bar tender looks pretty stressed with all the customers.

items.name: tavern_key
items.desc: The key to the town tavern

locations.name: general_store
locations.desc: There is a large wanted poster on the wall and collections of weapons and other items around the store.

items.name: wanted_poster
items.desc: It reads: "WANTED: Garunthel, arch-demon of destruction. Preferably dead. REWARD: To be negotiated."

characters.name: general_store_manager
characters.desc: The general store manager. Looks like he knows a thing or two about weaponry...

items.name: iron_shield
items.desc: A well build iron shield. Great for protecting myself.

items.name: rope
items.desc: About 20m worth of rope in a ring.

items.name: birthday_cake
items.desc: A triple layered birthday cake. Looks delicious!
